title: 'Bombshell' Jan. 6 Testimony Is ALREADY Falling Apart | 6/29/22
description:
Pat and Stu go through the latest in the January 6 committee hearings and how the new "bombshell" testimonies lack substance. Pat and Stu do what the media refuse to do: apply logic and critical thinking skills to the January 6 testimony to explain what it means. Pro-abortion activists at Amazon wrote a letter to the company demanding that Amazon stop business in pro-life states. Pat and Stu go over all the widespread media stories that turned out to be untrue. Pat and Stu commiserate with each other's car-buying issues. Pat and Stu talk about the absurdity and inconsistency of modern-day gender theory. Reports that a Google A.I. had gained sentience may have been overblown.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
